full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 U.S. Department of Justice FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION (Family name) (First nome) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY FILE NUMBER DELVA ELIZABETH FEMALE 11/19/43 U.S. A U.S. ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. ELIZABETH HERAUX Port-Au-Prince, Haiti (If or FOIA (b)( (6) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH(If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE HERAUX, GEORGES 06/06/07 Port-Au-Prince, Haiti Miami, FL FATHER MOTHER (Maiden name) KALMAR, GERTRUDE 08/08/13 Viena, Austria Deceased HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) Port-AupPrince WIFE DELVA HENRY Haiti 05/12/63 Haiti FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES(if none,so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE NONE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR STREET AND NUMBER 348 Ballena Drive Diamond Bar CA USA 05 PRESENT TIME APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATIONISPECIFYE MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR MITUBISHI INTERNATIONAL CORP 12 63 PRESENT TIME Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Mazabeth 7/10/92 OTHER (SPECIFY): IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS. WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW.
